text:
Dear [redacted_name],
I can no longer support you financially, I have already lent you my savings.
Talk to your lawyer. He knows your assets and should give him security. He must accept that you cannot pay the remaining amount demanded until you have received the money. Also make him aware of your and [redacted_name] predicament.
It cannot be that the whole drama of:
overstay, flight ticket, hospital stay and the associated costs starts again.
Yes [redacted_name], it's all very hard for me to believe and understand. But I hope your lawyer will see reason so that your life can return to normal.
Now I wish you a lot of luck ğŸ€ and I hope I hear from you soon
Your friend
M[redacted_name]My favourite drinks are mineral water, tea and sometimes ğŸ·
Von meinem iPhone gesendet
